uk.ac.ebi.ep.adapter.bioportal
Interface IBioportalAdapter

All Known Implementing Classes:
BioportalWsAdapter
public interface IBioportalAdapter

Proxy to get data from BioPortal.

Author:
rafa

Method Detail

getDiseaseByName

@Deprecated
uk.ac.ebi.ep.enzyme.model.Disease getDiseaseByName(String name)
                                                   throws BioportalAdapterException
Deprecated. use the generic method getDisease(java.lang.String) instead, as this one can search also by ID (misleading method name).

Retrieves a disease from EFO.

Parameters:
name - a disease name
Returns:
a Disease object whose name in EFO matches exactly the parameter, or null if not found.
Throws:
BioportalAdapterException

getDisease

uk.ac.ebi.ep.enzyme.model.Disease getDisease(String nameOrId)
                                             throws BioportalAdapterException
Retrieves a Disease from BioPortal.

Parameters:
nameOrId - the name or ID of a disease.
Returns:
a Disease object whose name or ID matches exactly the parameter, or null if not found.
Throws:
BioportalAdapterException
